title: Miravi, by KNoWS, IDLab, Ghent University -- imec
introductionText: Make your choice in the menu on the left.

queries.name: Count all triples in the dataset
queries.description: A dummy use-case-specific query, simply counting all triples in the dataset.
queries.comment: A comunicaContext specifying the source will be added automatically.

queries.name: Missing classes
queries.description: Listing classes that are not defined in the initial SHACL nor in the _customVoc sheet, i.e., classes containing 'http://missing.example.com/'.

queries.name: Missing properties
queries.description: Listing properties that are not defined in the initial SHACL nor in the _customVoc sheet, i.e., properties containing 'http://missing.example.com/', with the class of their domain.
